title: Father Eric on Jordan Peterson with Word on Fire
description: Roman Catholic priest Father Eric Seitz discusses his impressions on the Jordan Peterson with scholars from the Word on Fire Institute. Father Seitz is also going to be discussing my favorite encyclical, Mit Brennender Sorge from 1937 about the difficulties of the Catholic church under the Nazi regime in Germany. https://www.vatican.va/content/pius-xi/en/encyclicals/documents/hf_p-xi_enc_14031937_mit-brennender-sorge.html
